ygData.subject: Re: Limit on song memorization
ygData.msgSnippet: Ummm... they do don t they?  The time taken to mem a song decreases as you go up in level.  At 18 meming accelerado is extremely fast while Denon s discord
ygData.messageBody:
Ummm... they do don't they? The time taken to mem a song decreases as
you go up in level. At 18 meming accelerado is extremely fast while
Denon's discord takes forever. I'm sure that by the time I'm 40th DD
will be just as fast.

Bujold 18
Xegony


______________________________ Reply Separator _________________________________
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Limit on song memorization
Author: Non-HP-silky (silky@...) at HP-ColSprings,mimegw5
Date: 7/28/99 10:30 AM


From: silky@...


Well, for mages (yes I have an enchanter too - funny how they seem to fill
the same slot in magic circles as we bards do) although I may have trouble
deciding - it is INFINITELY easier to memorize spells, than songs.

Since we never get meditiate - our songs mem as slowly as the day we get
them - THAT is a problem.

Besides the ONE song we have that DOES use manna, any reason they can't
make our songs faster as we progress in skill?



>Actually, not true. I also play an enchanter, and at only 8th level, he
>already had problems deciding on what to memorize - and now having just
>gotten 12th (but none of the spells - too poor), he's gonna be hard-pressed
>to make his decision. As it is, he's already juggling spell slots (3
>buffs, 2 slots), and he can never decide whether invisibility or gate is
>more important.
